Catalog_pagination_issue_on_Elasticsearc.name: Catalog_pagination_issue_on_Elasticsearch_6
Catalog_pagination_issue_on_Elasticsearc.description: This patch resolves issues that users of Magento 2.3.3 experience in deployments where Elasticsearch 6.x is used as the catalog search engine. Users who attempt to navigate past the first page of search results are unsuccessful, and Magento displays an error message. After this patch is installed, users will be able to page through all search results.

PayPal_Express_Checkout_issue_fix_2.3.4_.name: PayPal_Express_Checkout_issue_fix
PayPal_Express_Checkout_issue_fix_2.3.4_.description: This patch resolves the issue which affects orders placed with PayPal Express Checkout where the orderâ€™s shipping address specifies a country region that has been manually entered into the text field rather than selected from the drop-down menu on the Shipping page.
